model

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Message>

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Message>
    A message object. The pertinent information gleaned from individual text messages is stored here.
    Author:
    JD Porterfield

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Date date
      The date that the message was received (which includes the time)
      static int INBOUND_MESSAGE
      Indicates a message is inbound and was sent FROM the user specified by the user String
      private int mode
      Indicates whether a message is in or out.
      static int OUTBOUND_MESSAGE
      Indicates a message is outbound and was sent TO the user specified by the user String
      private Message previousMessage
      The previous message sent to this message's user
      private java.lang.String text
      The actual body of the message
      private java.lang.String user
      The name of the user that sent or received the message (the owner of the message store is nameless)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(java.lang.String textIn, java.util.Date dateIn, int modeIn, java.lang.String userIn)
      Constructs a message object

    • Field Detail

      • text

        private final java.lang.String text
        The actual body of the message

      • date

        private final java.util.Date date
        The date that the message was received (which includes the time)

      • mode

        private final int mode
        Indicates whether a message is in or out. Is compared to INBOUND_ and OUTBOUND_MESSAGE

      • user

        private final java.lang.String user
        The name of the user that sent or received the message (the owner of the message store is nameless)

      • previousMessage

        private Message previousMessage
        The previous message sent to this message's user

      • OUTBOUND_MESSAGE

        public static final int OUTBOUND_MESSAGE
        Indicates a message is outbound and was sent TO the user specified by the user String
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INBOUND_MESSAGE

        public static final int INBOUND_MESSAGE
        Indicates a message is inbound and was sent FROM the user specified by the user String
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String textIn,
               java.util.Date dateIn,
               int modeIn,
               java.lang.String userIn)
        Constructs a message object
        Parameters:
        textIn - The text of the message
        dateIn - The date the message was sent
        modeIn - 0 if in, 1 if out
        userIn - The user's name that is associated with this text

        Will allow the messages to be sorted by their date
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Message>
        Parameters:

        Returns:
